# Auto-generated
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.0)
project(argos VERSION 0.1.0)

# Auto-generated
include(CTest)
enable_testing()

# Generated by the king of cmakes :crown:
file(GLOB SOURCES "main.cpp" "core/camera/camera.cpp" "core/log/log.cpp")
add_executable(argos ${SOURCES})
target_include_directories(argos PUBLIC ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/core/camera ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/core/log)

# Auto-generated
set(CPACK_PROJECT_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
set(CPACK_PROJECT_VERSION ${PROJECT_VERSION})
include(CPack)
